00021 #ifndef _NODE_H_
00022 #define _NODE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "actypes.h"
00025 
00026 #ifdef __cplusplus
00027 extern "C" {
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /* Forward Declaration */
00031 struct edge;
00032 
00033 /* automata node */
00034 typedef struct AC_NODE
00035 {
00036     int id; /* Node ID : for debugging purpose */
00037     short int final; /* 0: no ; 1: yes, it is a final node */
00038     struct AC_NODE * failure_node; /* The failure node of this node */
00039     unsigned short depth; /* depth: distance between this node and the root */
00040 
00041     /* Matched patterns */
00042     AC_PATTERN_t * matched_patterns; /* Array of matched patterns */
00043     unsigned short matched_patterns_num; /* Number of matched patterns at this node */
00044     unsigned short matched_patterns_max; /* Max capacity of allocated memory for matched_patterns */
00045 
00046     /* Outgoing Edges */
00047     struct edge * outgoing; /* Array of outgoing edges */
00048     unsigned short outgoing_degree; /* Number of outgoing edges */
00049     unsigned short outgoing_max; /* Max capacity of allocated memory for outgoing */
00050 } AC_NODE_t;
00051 
00052 /* The Edge of the Node */
00053 struct edge
00054 {
00055     AC_ALPHABET_t alpha; /* Edge alpha */
00056     AC_NODE_t * next; /* Target of the edge */
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 AC_NODE_t * node_create            (void);
00061 AC_NODE_t * node_create_next       (AC_NODE_t * thiz, AC_ALPHABET_t alpha);
00062 void        node_register_matchstr (AC_NODE_t * thiz, AC_PATTERN_t * str);
00063 void        node_register_outgoing (AC_NODE_t * thiz, AC_NODE_t * next, AC_ALPHABET_t alpha);
00064 AC_NODE_t * node_find_next         (AC_NODE_t * thiz, AC_ALPHABET_t alpha);
00065 AC_NODE_t * node_findbs_next       (AC_NODE_t * thiz, AC_ALPHABET_t alpha);
00066 void        node_release           (AC_NODE_t * thiz);
00067 void        node_assign_id         (AC_NODE_t * thiz);
00068 void        node_sort_edges        (AC_NODE_t * thiz);
00069 
00070 #ifdef __cplusplus
00071 }
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #endif
